name: Siewicz, Appellant, v. Wyoming Valley Hospital

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Siewicz, Appellant, v. Wyoming Valley Hospital.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Musmanno,
Reversed. Flagiello v. Pennsylvania Hospital, 417 Pa. 486, 208 A. 2d 193.
Mr. Justice Jones dissents.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Musmanno,

opinions.text:
Dissenting Opinion by
Mr. Chief Justice Bell:
I dissent for the reasons set forth at great length in my dissenting Opinion in Flagiello v. Pennsylvania Hospital, 417 Pa. 486, 208 A. 2d 193.
opinions.author: Mr. Chief Justice Bell:

attorneys: John G. Zapotok, with Mm Joseph V. Kasper, for appellant.
James P. Harris, Jr., for hospital, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Siewicz, Appellant, v. Wyoming Valley Hospital.
Argued May 4, 1964; reargued November 18, 1964.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
John G. Zapotok, with Mm Joseph V. Kasper, for appellant.
James P. Harris, Jr., for hospital, appellee.
March 22, 1965:
